name: Doctors Notes
description:
This was our university capstone project submission in 2021. There will be no further development on it (and it is extremely broken.)

My reason for uploading it here is to showcase more of my game development technical artistry, which is visible despite the state of the game, so it serves that purpose

My work:

  • post-processing
  • potion & plague shaders
  • compiling the assets into scenes
  • custom font
  • custom paper texture
  • logo 
  • map

Some excerpts of which are in this YouTube playlist.

Credits

Ben - Writer and Narrative Designer
Cara - Artist and Level Designer
Emiliano - Programmer and Sound Designer
Gabriel - Shader Wizard, HR Manager and Technical Artist
Lea - Volunteer Artist
Lual - 3D Asset Artist 
Mihai - Programmer and UI Design
Shiva - Programmer
William - Programmer and Producer
